messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using Java and the Spring Boot 2.x framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. To initiate this process, I'll provide you with the path to a file, your task is to determine whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints, rather than just project configuration, feature implementation, database operations, unit tests, or functional tests. You need to follow the structured output, including an indication of whether this file contains API entries and the reasoning behind your judgment.

contains_api_entries.description: Whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints.
contains_api_entries.title: Contains Api Entries

message.content: {"contains_api_entries": true, "reason": "The path suggests a controller class in the API layer (src/main/java/.../api/controllers) and the class name CodePasteController is a conventional name for a REST controller that exposes endpoints (e.g., for creating, retrieving, or listing code pastes). In Spring Boot, such controllers are typically annotated with @RestController/@RequestMapping and define HTTP endpoints, so it is highly likely this file contains API definitions rather than only configuration or tests."}
